channel.title: A question about Interfaces
channel.description:
Hello. Im farely new to all of this java stuff and i was wondering how do i change the text on interfaces? Also how do i make the interface pop up when you get to a certain area?
Any help would be much appriciated. :D

item.title: A question about Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @123is456 123is456
item.description:
@123is456 wrote:

How would i start the sendQuest?
like if i wanted to say, “Warning, You about about to enter the wilderness”
would i just write…
sendQuest(“Warning, you are about to enter the wilderness”, 8150

}
?
What would i write to tell it to say that?

Read full topic

item.title: A question about Interfaces
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You would use a boolean that detects your absX and absY. To open an interface you would do something like this…

setInterfaceWalkable(####);

Writing the lines requires finding the sendQuest line IDs.

Read full topic
